csranks 0.1.0

Simultaneous confidence sets for ranks using the bootstrap

Source: R/ranks.R
csranks_simul_boot.Rd

This function is called by csranks_simul and by csranks_multinom when simul=TRUE and bootstrap=TRUE.

csranks_simul_boot(x, param, coverage = 0.95, cstype = "two-sided",
  stepdown = TRUE, bootdist = "normal", R = 1000, indices = NA,
  seed = NA)

Arguments

x

vector of estimates
param

parameters required for bootstrap: if bootdist="normal", then param is a vector of standard errors of x; if bootdist="multinom", then param is number of trials.
coverage

nominal coverage of the confidence set. Default is 0.95.
cstype

type of confidence set (two-sided, upper, lower). Default is two-sided.
stepdown

logical; if TRUE (default), stepwise procedure is used, otherwise single step procedure is used.
bootdist

distribution to be used for parametric bootstrap; either normal (default) or multinomial.
R

number of bootstrap replications. Default is 1000.
indices

vector of indices of x for whose ranks the confidence sets are computed. indices=NA (default) means computation for all ranks.
seed

seed for bootstrap random variable draws. If set to NA (default), then seed is not set.

Value

L, U lower and upper bounds of the confidence set for ranks indicated in indices.

Contents

Developed by Daniel Wilhelm.
